  3. Elton John, Dua Lipa, Coldplay Among 400 Artists Seeking Copyright Protection Amid A.I. Surge  Rolling Stone
  4. Elton John, Dua Lipa Urge UK to Rethink AI Copyright Plans  Bloomberg

item.title: SoundCloud changes policies to allow AI training on user content - TechCrunch
item.description:
1. SoundCloud changes policies to allow AI training on user content  TechCrunch
  2. SoundCloud changes its TOS again after an AI uproar  The Verge
  3. SoundCloud ‘fixes’ AI policy following backlash; CEO Eliah Seton says ‘AI should support artists, not replace them’  Music Business Worldwide
  4. After Backlash, SoundCloud Shares Statement Clarifying AI Policy  Stereogum
  5. SoundCloud Updates AI Policy in Terms of Use After Backlash  pitchfork.com
